Articles.Content: I remember getting this game back when it was still in 0.15 (or maybe earlier?) and being absolutely enthralled in it. I've only just been getting back into it lately, and I haven't started at all on orbiting yet, just been messing around in FAR to see what I can build. Anyways, this is my first time on the forums (just getting out of the Curious George Group), and I can't wait to complain about nerfs/exalt new features with the rest of you guys now.

Great! I'm sure you'll find a good time, helpful answers, and interesting debates!

And altough FAR is awesome, have you tried the new stock aerodynamics?

Welcome CheckenShark! Good to have you join the forums.

There's also exalting the nerfs and complaining about the new features. It's an interesting and fun community.

Happy landings!
